code: import React,{useState}from'react';import"./portifolio.css";import Menu from'./Menu';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Portifolio(){const[items,setItems]=useState(Menu);const filterItem=categoryItem=>{const filteredItems=Menu.filter(curElem=>curElem.category===categoryItem);setItems(filteredItems);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"work container section",id:"work",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section_title",children:"Recent Works"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work_filters",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work_item",onClick:()=>setItems(Menu),children:"Everything"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work_item",onClick:()=>filterItem("FRONTEND"),children:"FrontEnd"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work_item",onClick:()=>filterItem("BACKEND"),children:"BackEnd"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work_item",onClick:()=>filterItem("WEB3"),children:"Web3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work_item",onClick:()=>filterItem("WEB3"),children:"Favorite"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work_container grid",children:items.map(elem=>{const{id,image,title,category,link}=elem;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work_card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work_thumbnail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"Project",className:"work_img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work_mask"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work_category",children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"work_title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"work_button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-link work_button-icon"})})]},id);})})]});}
